name: Crohnam

skills.name: Djinn Swords
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 30% chance of increasing the duration of a random debuff on the target by 1 turn. If Djamarsa is on the same team, each hit also increases the duration of any HP Burn debuffs on the target by 1 turn.

skills.name: Berserker’s Delight
skills.description: Attacks 3 times at random. Each hit has an 80% chance of instantly activating any HP Burn debuffs on each target. Heals this Champion by 10% of their MAX HP for each HP Burn debuff activated by this skill. (4 turn cooldown)

skills.name: Blazing Zephyr
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has an 80% chance of placing a HP Burn debuff for 2 turns. Fills this Champion’s Turn Meter by 15% for each HP Burn debuff placed by this skill. (4 turn cooldown)

skills.name: Simmering Anger (Passive)
skills.description: [Passive Effect] Every 10 times Active Skills are used in battle by either enemy or allied Champions, this Champion instantly activates the Berserker’s Delight skill. This happens every 5 times Active Skills are used if Djamarsa is on the same team. [Active Effect] If Djamarsa is on the same team, revives this Champion with 50% HP and 50% Turn Meter when killed. (4 turn cooldown)

skills.name: Aura
skills.description: Increases Ally ACC in all Battles by 50.

book_priority: A2 and A3 for cooldowns and debuff chance. A1 for higher debuff extension chance if books are available.
notes_synergy: Best paired with Djamarsa for passive revive and faster skill cycling.
Excellent for Spider, Hydra, Doom Tower, and Sand Devil.
Can solo Sand Devil with Regen set and correct masteries.
Needs high ACC for HP Burn and activation reliability.
Synergizes with other HP Burn champions for maximum uptime.
